Clue Quest.title: Treasure Hunt
Clue Quest.overview: Embark on an adventurous Treasure Hunt with unique maps and strategic clues! In Round 1, students and faculties compete separately, and winners face off in Round 2 for an even more thrilling challenge. Respect the clues, follow the rules, and let the spirit of teamwork shine. Judges' decisions are final, with recognition for creativity and sportsmanship!
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.
Each team will be provided with a unique treasure map.
Clues will be strategically placed around the campus.
Teams are required to follow the clues sequentially.
In Round 1, students & faculties will compete separately, and the winners (2 pairs from students and 2 from faculties) will compete in Round 2.
Final Score of Round 1 will be based on the time taken to complete the hunt. (Teams must return to the starting point within the stipulated time.)

In Round 2, students will face off against faculty in another thrilling round of treasure hunt with a higher level of difficulty, where teams will have to search for clues to reach the final Treasure.
Please do not tamper with the clues and ruin the fun of the game.
Participants must adhere to college rules and guidelines during the event.
Respect for campus property and fellow participants is mandatory.
Participants are requested to arrive at the venue 30 minutes prior to the scheduled time.
Decisions taken by the judges and event coordinator will be final. (Recognition for creativity, teamwork, and sportsmanship will also be acknowledged.)

World Screen Whiz War.title: All In One Quiz
World Screen Whiz War.overview: Gear up for three exciting rounds in the Quizmania event! From text-based questions to enacting scenes in a bonus round, and finally, a buzzer round testing your quick thinking. Only the sharpest minds will prevail.
rules: Upon completion of registration, it will be considered final; no alterations will be accommodated under any circumstances.
The competition will involve 3 rounds.
Round 1 will be an Elimination round.
Text questions based on Bollywood/Hollywood/Anime or K-drama.
Out of 10 teams, only 8 will be selected for the next round.
Round 2 will be the Bonus round.
This round will be similar to Dumb Charades. You will have to enact the scene/song.
Only 6 teams will go forward to the last round.
Round 3 will be the Buzzer round.
In the last round, you will be shown images for a limited time period after which you'll have to guess the answer.
This is the 'fastest finger first' round.
Any decision taken by the Event Coordinators will be FINAL.
